record.dc:title: 61RE12 DeArmond Site 2RE12, Roane Co., TN. Pit No. 94, Cross section view of kettle shaped pit associated with old humus below Mississippi village. Bottom is filled with charred wood or bark and fire cracked stones. Similar to Features 1 and 2 but smaller. (Note absence of mussel shell in contents.) Datum 10.1' (top) Sq. 42L5. Direction west.
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph.
